title: IALFM is open for Salah starting Jumma Salah Feb 21
body: IALFM is ready to welcome you starting Jumma Salah on Feb 21st at 2:10 pm.

title: Eid Salah Announcement.
body: Eid Mubarak to you and your families. There will be NO Eid Salah at IALFM. Please check other masajid's websites for Eid Salah schedules.
